S08n656:1: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
S08n656:4: yaṃ jñātvā sarvamantracaryāniyogayuktāḥ sarvasattvā sarvamantrāṇāṃ kālākālaṃ jñāsyanate |
S08n656:6: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
S08n656:8: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto utthāyāsanādekāṃśamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ siṃhāsanaṃ tenāñjalimupanāmya trirapi pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantametadavocat |
S08n656:13: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya sādhukāramadāt |
S08n656:14: sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ ! yastvaṃ tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripraśnitavyaṃ manyase |
S08n656:17: atha bhagavāṃ sarvāvatīṃ parṣadamavalokya sarvabhūtarutapracodanī nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma |
S08n656:18: samanantarasamāpannasya bhagavataḥ ye kecit sattvānantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu sthitā sarve te buddharaśmyāvabhāsitā sarvāṃśca tāṃ buddhāṃ bhagavatāṃ śirasā praṇamya anantāparyantalokadhātusthitāṃ abhyarcayena bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ śuddhāvāsabhavanoparisthitaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ tenopajagmuḥ |
S08n656:19: yena ca sahā lokadhātuḥ tena ca pratyaṣṭhāt |
S08n656:20: tatra ca sthitā sarvabhūtagaṇā buddhānubhāvena svakaṃ svakaṃ rutaṃ vidarśayantaḥ bhagavataḥ pādamūlasamīpopagatā dharmaśravaṇāya |
S08n656:21: bhagavantaṃ praṇamya mabhyarcya ca yathāsthāneṣu ca sanniṣaṇṇā abhūvaṃ dharmaśravaṇāya ||
S08n656:22: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ śākyasiṃho śākyarājādhitanayaḥ teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ dhārmyā kathāyā sandarśayati samuttejayati sampraharṣayati teṣāṃ sarvabhūtasureśvarāṇāṃ tathā tathā dharmadeśanā kṛtavāṃ yathā taiḥ sarvaiḥ kaiścidanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhaucityānyutpāditāni |
S08n656:23: kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ voko kaiścicchrāvakatve kaiścitkaiścit satyāni dṛṣṭvāni kaiścidarhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ kaiścid daśakuśale karmapathe sthitvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam |
S08n656:24: anantāṃ buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ anantāṃ kalpakoṭīṣvajopasthānaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapradānaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanapariṣkāraṃ pradadyāpa iti niyatā ca bhaviṣyāmo buddhabodheriti ||
S08n656:25: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāmāśayaṃ jñātvā mantraṃ bhāṣate sma sarvabhūtarutābhijñā nāma |
S08n656:26: yaṃ sādhayitvā sarvabodhisattvāḥ sarvasattvāśca rutaṃ vijāneyuḥ ekakṣaṇena sarveṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ yathāgocaramasthitānām |
S08n656:31: ādau tāvanmahāraṇyaṃ gatvā kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ mūlaphalaśākāhāro vā akṣaralakṣaṃ japet |
S08n656:32: triḥkālasnāyinā valkalavāsasā pūrvavat sarvaṃ vidhinā kartavyam |
S08n656:34: tataḥ pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā akṣaralakṣasyānte tatraiva sādhanamārabhet |
S08n656:36: agnikuṇḍaṃ kṛtvā dvihastapramāṇaṃ caturhastavistīrṇaṃ samantāccaturaśraṃ sarvapuṣpaphalairarghyaṃ datvā prāṅmukhaḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ navamagnimutpādya kṣīravṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya śrīphalaphalānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n656:38: tato pūrvāyāṃ diśi mahāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā buddho bhagavānāgacchati |
S08n656:40: aparāmṛṣṭe sādhake tatkṣaṇādeva bhagavato vācā niścarate - siddhastvaṃ gaccha yatheṣṭam,
S08n656:42: tataḥprabhṛti sādhakaḥ pañcābhijño bhavati mahāprabhāvadivyamūrttiḥ bodhisattvācāraḥ dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtiḥ yatheṣṭagatiḥ sarvabhūtarutajñaḥ,
S08n656:43: ekakṣaṇamātreṇa sarvabhūtānāṃ rutaṃ vijānīte prabhavaśca bhavati yatheṣṭagāmī |
S08n656:46: viṃśatibhiḥ sādhanapraveśairniyataṃ sidhyatīti nātra vicikitsā kāryā prasādhitasyāpi na mantraṃ japatā pūrvamāditaścaiva madhye caiva nibodhatām ||
S08n656:47: rutajñānaṃ prabhāvaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ caiva kīrtyate |
S08n656:49: bhāṣitaṃ kathyate loke madhyadeśe ca kīrtitā |
S08n656:52: tathā te devarāṭ sarve mantrāṃ vavre svabhāvataḥ ||
S08n656:53: tridaśo madhyadeśe ca vatsa paśya daśārṇavā |
S08n656:54: amante yathā vācā tathā deśeṣu jāyate ||
S08n656:64: tathā sarvato vakrā dṛṣṭyā caiva supūjitā ||
S08n656:65: bhavante te sadā devā madhyadeśe savācakā |
S08n656:67: meghagarjanā teṣāṃ vācaiṣā tāṃ tu lakṣayet |
S08n656:71: abhāvādāśrayāt teṣāṃ na vācāṃ jagmire surāḥ |
S08n656:72: adhaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ surāḥ sarve madhyadeśeṣu vācakā ||
S08n656:74: atha devāmatha bhūmyā vai yakṣāścaiva maharddhikāḥ ||
S08n656:80: sarvadevagaṇā śreṣṭhā vācā hyeṣā tu kīrtyate ||
S08n656:85: tathā devālaye vāṇī madhuraṃ cāpi sūktajitā |
S08n656:86: rutaṃ mataṃ tathā jñeyaṃ karmeṣveva niyojayet ||
S08n656:89: tathā daityagaṇā śreṣṭhaṃ rutaṃ cāpi niyojayet |
S08n656:94: sarveṣāṃ janapadāaṃ vā tathā teṣāṃ tu kalpayet ||
S08n656:96: devānāṃ ca tathā nityaṃ purogānāṃ parikīrtayet ||
S08n656:98: nāgāṃścaiva sadā kāle yathā vācā nibodhatām ||
S08n656:99: lāḍodreṣu tathā sindhau yathā muttarato tathā |
S08n656:100: janeṣveva hi sarvatra tāṃ tu teṣāṃ niyojayet ||
S08n656:101: nāgānāṃ ca yathā lāḍī vācā hyuktā manīṣiṇī |
S08n656:102: yakṣāṇāṃ tu tathā vācā uttarāṃ diśi ye narāḥ ||
S08n656:103: garuḍānāṃ yathā hyedre kinnarāṇāṃ tu kīrtyate |
S08n656:104: nepāle sarvato vācā yathā sā tāṃ nibodhatām ||
S08n656:106: vindhyajātā manuṣyāṇāṃ mlecchānāṃ ca yā vācā ||
S08n656:107: pūtanānāṃ tu sā jñeyā vācaiṣāṃ parikīrtitā |
S08n656:108: rākṣasānāṃ yathā vācā tāṃ vavre surottamā ||
S08n656:111: tāṃ tu vācā samālakṣye rākṣaseṣveva niyojayet |
S08n656:114: sarvato trividhā jñeyā deśabhāṣāśca te tridhā ||
S08n656:115: triḥprakāraṃ tathā karma trideśaṃ caiva yojayet |
S08n656:116: trividhaḥ sarvato jñeyaḥ trividhaṃ karma rutaṃ smṛtam ||
S08n656:126: liṅgamarthaṃ tathā pātraṃ devaṃ caiva niyojayet ||
S08n656:127: śreyasā śreyase caiva āveśānāṃ tu lakṣayet |
S08n656:131: te tu vyaktaṃ narā jñeyā mlecchabhāṣāratā hi te |
S08n656:134: dakṣiṇātyā yathā vācā cañcalā bhavati ninditā ||
S08n656:136: bahudhā rutayā jyeṣṭhā āviṣṭānāṃ tu trijāparām ||
S08n656:137: ākṛṣṭā mantribhiḥ kṣipraṃ svayaṃ vā iha māgatā |
S08n656:138: bahudhā gṛhṇanti sattvānāṃ mātarā sagrahā surā ||
S08n656:146: teṣā nordhvaṃ gatā dṛṣṭi ardho dṛk nordhvagatā hi te ||
S08n656:151: garuḍānāṃ tathā vācā āviṣṭānāṃ tu lakṣayet |
S08n656:160: svena svena tu kāyena yo liṅgena tu lakṣayet ||
S08n656:161: tena tena tu liṅgena taṃ taṃ sattvaṃ vinirdiśet |
S08n656:162: kaśmalā kathitā sarve adho dṛṣṭigatā hi te ||
S08n656:167: āviṣṭānāṃ bhuvi martyānāṃ kathitā liṅgāni vai sadā |
S08n656:169: tathaiva tad yojayet kṣipraṃ bhūmirmānuṣatāṃ gatāḥ |
S08n656:171: nirīkṣante tathā cordhvaṃ diśāṃ caiva samantataḥ |
S08n656:174: prasannaglatyā tathā sarve suraśreṣṭhā nu lakṣayet ||
S08n656:180: teṣāṃ rūpadharā kāntiḥ āśrayā te parivartaye ||
S08n656:189: ṛṣiṇā kathitā hyete saṃyatā te ṛṣavasthitā |
S08n656:190: āviṣṭānāṃ tadā liṅgā ṛṣīṇāṃ kathitā mayā ||
S08n656:193: mātarāṇāṃ tadevaṃ tu keṣāṃ ceva tu dṛśyate |
S08n656:194: kravyādā nagnakā tiṣṭhe sacelā niścelatāṃ gatā ||
S08n656:206: teṣāṃ ca kathitaṃ liṅgaṃ caritaṃ tu vibhāvitam ||
S08n656:210: āviṣṭānāṃ tathā liṅgā kathitā bhūtale nṛṇām ||
S08n656:217: tat sarvaṃ bodhayet kṣipraṃ mantriṇe cintitaṃ tu yat |
S08n656:220: nabhāṣa madhuraṃ vācaṃ na yajño satvarā surāḥ ||
S08n656:221: niḥśreṣṭhā vivaśā caiva sthitā te maunamāśritāḥ |
S08n656:222: na vācā kiñcanasteṣāṃ na cittā nāpi mānitā ||
S08n656:223: tasmāt taṃ na cākṛṣye taṃ jāpī parivartayet |
S08n656:225: nākṛṣyaṃ vidyate kiñcid duṣkaraṃ teṣāṃ japtamantrārthatāpinām |
S08n656:233: nānye mantrarāṭ śaktā laukikā ye maharddhikā |
S08n656:235: varṇituṃ gaṇayituṃ gantuṃ taṃ sthānaṃ yatra te sadā |
S08n656:239: tasmāt taṃ na cālaye yatnā na vṛthāmarthena yojayet |
S08n656:241: aśaktā sarvamantrā vai gantuṃ yatra te tadā |
S08n656:246: dhīro gambhīratāṃ yāto alpabāṣpo bhavet tadā ||
S08n656:275: parāmṛśyantaṃ tadā vajraṃ mudrāṃ vadhnāti mātmanām |
S08n656:276: tuṣṭo varado martyāṃ bhogāṃ dāpayate sadā ||
S08n656:277: mahātmā kṛṣṇavarṇo vai īṣi dṛśyati tatkṣaṇāt |
S08n656:279: nṛṇāṃ kimarthametaṃ vo karmavaraṃ dāsyāma vo bhuve |
S08n656:281: varadā saprabhā mantrā phalaṃ dadyustadā tadā |
S08n656:285: nirmāṇā kathyate bimbaṃ na bimbaṃ nirmāṇamāśṛtam |
S08n656:295: laukikānāṃ tu mantrāṇāṃ mantranāthaṃ tu yojayet |
S08n656:297: taṃ niyuñjya tadā mantrī mantreṣveva ca sarvataḥ |
S08n656:299: svaliṅgā vācayā caiva taṃ niyuñjyatha mantriṇām |
S08n656:300: bahuliṅgā tadā caiṣā svaliṅgā caiva sādhaye ||
S08n656:303: eṣa kālakramo yoge āveśe caiva yojayet |
S08n656:305: niyuñjyāt sarvato mantrī japtamātrāṃ ca cetarām |
S08n656:309: itarāṃ laukikāṃ devāṃ āhvaye caiva maharddhikām |
S08n656:312: anyamantrā na cāhveyā nānye devagaṇā sadā ||
S08n656:313: svayamevāgatā ye tu samaye tāṃ niyojayet |
S08n656:315: taṃ tasmā netarāṃ karmaṃ āveśāṃ cāpi varjayet |
S08n656:316: ākṛṣṭā maharddhikā devā divyā āryāśca bhūmijā |
S08n656:322: sāgarā bhramate kṣipraṃ patate ca muhurmuhuḥ |
S08n656:324: vividhā nāgavare hyete antāntā teṣu nibodhatām |
S08n656:325: kecid bhāvayato hṛṣṭo kecit tiṣṭhanti niścalam ||
S08n656:327: patanti vividhākāraṃ plutaṃ cāpi karoti vai ||
S08n656:334: te tu mantrā sadā yojyā daṣṭāviṣṭeṣu sarvataḥ |
S08n656:339: aśeṣaṃ kathitaṃ hyetaṃ daṣṭaviṣṭaṃ va lakṣaṇam ||
S08n656:341: nārakānāṃ tu bhāṣāṃ vā kathyamānāṃ nibodhatām ||
S08n656:344: tadā te kathaye vācāṃ rephaṃyuktāṃ sabhairavām |
S08n656:346: kathayanti bhayaṃ tatra kṣudhā caiva ca darśayet |
S08n656:348: krūrāṃ darśayed vācāṃ bhayaṃ tatra nivedayet |
S08n656:351: tadā te kathayantyete tāṃ vācāṃ bhayabhairavām ||
S08n656:353: teṣāṃ kṣīrasamaṃ deyaṃ toyaṃ caiva sukhodayam ||
S08n656:362: rodamāne tadā sarve sattvānāṃ ca niveditā |
S08n656:365: āgatya grāmavāse'smiṃ kathayanti yathā hi tam ||
S08n656:369: yadā dakṣiṇato gacche mṛgā gacchetha magratam ||
S08n656:370: siddhiṃ ca nirdiśante tāḥ mṛgāścaiva supuṣkalām |
S08n656:372: na gacchet tatra medhāvī jambūkaiśca nivāritaḥ |
S08n656:373: praviśet svālayaṃ kṣipraṃ kathayāmāsa te tadā ||
S08n656:378: cāṣā ca pakṣiṇā sarve mṛgāścaiva sajambukā |
S08n656:381: kathayāmāsa te sarvaṃ gaccha pūjyo bhaviṣyasi ||
S08n656:383: mārge yadi dṛśyate sthānagacchet kutra vā kvacit ||
S08n656:385: gacchatāṃ svakamāvāsaṃ svastho tiṣṭhati sve gṛhe ||
S08n656:386: na gacchet tatra mantrajño uragaistu niveditam |
S08n656:387: yadi gacchet tadā kālaṃ udvego mṛtyu vā bhavet ||
S08n656:391: kecit tiryagatā divyāḥ mānuṣā bhāṣiṇo tadā ||
S08n656:392: yo'yaṃ nivedaye vācāṃ taṃ tathaiva niyojayet |
S08n656:402: sa jñeyā mānuṣī vācā rutaṃ caiva svabhāvataḥ |
S08n656:406: bhṛśaṃ tatra haret kṣipraṃ taruṃ tasya sudāruṇam |
S08n656:407: rudyate paśurājā vai karuṇaṃ dīna nivedayet ||
S08n656:410: paścime mahad bhayaṃ vidyāt dakṣiṇe śāntikāmatām |
S08n656:416: catvāro matha pañcā vā sapta ṣaṣṭha nibodhitā |
S08n656:421: yathā siṃhe tathā sarvaṃ sarvaprāṇiṣu yojayet ||
S08n656:422: śarabhaiḥ śārdūlākhyairvai yathā tata sarva nibodhatām |
S08n656:424: kintu prāsādikaṃ jñānaṃ katthyate tāṃ surottamām |
S08n656:425: kroṣṭukeṣu ca sarvatra tāṃ tathaiva niyojayet ||
S08n656:426: pūrvapaścimato bhāge yadā hastī ruded bhṛśam |
S08n656:427: tasmānmahad bhayaṃ vidyāt tatra deśeṣu jantunām ||
S08n656:431: gacchato vāmataḥ kāko bhṛśaṃ rauti sudāruṇam ||
S08n656:432: na gacchet tatra medhāvī vāyasena niveditam |
S08n656:434: na gacchet tatra mantrajño gacchan mṛtyuvaśo bhavet |
S08n656:435: gomayaṃ bhakṣayet pakṣī yadā rauti sukhodayam ||
S08n656:440: suśubhaṃ kūjate kṣipraṃ madhuraṃ cāpi bhāṣitam |
S08n656:442: gṛhadvāraṃ yadā paśyaṃ vāyaso ravato bhṛśam |
S08n656:443: tatra rātrau bhavet tasya śastrasampāta cauribhiḥ ||
S08n656:451: tat sarvaṃ siṃhato jñeyaṃ śivānnu sarvadā ||
S08n656:454: sarve śivagaṇā proktā śāyamprāte ca śobhanā |
S08n656:456: śivā śivatamā proktā dvitīyā rāve tu kīrtyate |
S08n656:457: tṛtīye rāve tathā jñeyā rājñe artthāvahā bhavet ||
S08n656:458: caturtthe tu mahālābhaṃ pañcame putradā smṛtā |
S08n656:459: ṣaṣṭhe ca dhananiṣpattiḥ saptame na bhave śubhā ||
S08n656:461: evaṃ karoti śivā tatra asaṅkhyeyā te'pyaniṣṭadā ||
S08n656:466: ṣaṣṭhe corāgamaṃ vidyā sarvatastu śivā tu sā |
S08n656:469: utareṇa tu yo rāvo śivāyāḥ śrūyate sadā ||
S08n656:471: dvitīye krūrarāve tu duḥkhadā sā bhavet tadā ||
S08n656:475: aṣṭame niḥphalaṃ vidyā tadūrdhvaṃ yaḥ kiñci roditi ||
S08n656:476: pūrveṇa ca yadā rauti śivā yāme tu mantime |
S08n656:477: tadā rājāgamaṃ vidyā dvitīyārāve tu preṣiṇām ||
S08n656:478: tṛtīyaṃ rājato mṛtyuḥ baddho vā yadi śrūyate |
S08n656:480: ṣaṣṭhe ca bhavate vyādhiḥ saptame agnito bhayam |
S08n656:481: aṣṭame niḥphalaṃ vidyā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat sadā ||
S08n656:483: prathamena bhavet saukhyaṃ dvitīye sarvato janām ||
S08n656:488: nirdiśe ca dhruvā jñeyā śivā krūratamā smṛtā |
S08n656:492: ṣaṣṭhe mlecchināṃ hanti saptame taskarā tadā |
S08n656:497: dvitīyena hanyate hastī rājño mukhyo gajottamam ||
S08n656:500: pañcame dhananāśaṃ tu ṣaṣṭhe vyādhi sambhavet |
S08n656:501: saptamena bhave duḥkhaṃ sarvato ca bhayāvaham ||
S08n656:502: aṣṭame niḥphalaṃ vidyā pūrvaṃ vai sarvato tadā |
S08n656:504: atikrūrā yadā kṣipraṃ śivā vyāharate tadā |
S08n656:506: atikrūrā yadā kṣipraṃ śivā vyāharate tadā |
S08n656:510: caturthena bhaved vyādhiḥ sarveṣāṃ ca tadā jane |
S08n656:511: pañcame hanyate putro amātyo vā nṛpaterdhruvam ||
S08n656:513: saptamena haned rāṣṭraṃ muktaṃ cāpi vinirdiśet ||
S08n656:514: aṣṭame niḥphalaṃ vidyā pūrvavat kathitā sadā |
S08n656:515: ataḥ ūrdhvaṃ tathā rāvo śivānāṃ ca bhave yadā ||
S08n656:531: paśuveṣakṛtā kecid dṛṣṭyā naṣṭā ca jantuṣu ||
S08n656:532: vividhaṃ karoti sarve te sarvatra vasudhātale |
S08n656:545: jñeyaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ sarvaṃ krūraiḥ saumyaiśca liṅgibhiḥ ||
S08n656:546: chatraṃ śitaṃ patākaṃ ca matsaṃ māṃsaṃ ca sārdrayoḥ |
S08n656:547: utkṣiptā ca medīnī padmayantra gomayaṃ tadā ||
S08n656:548: dadhi puṣpaṃ phalaṃ caiva striyaṃ vāmbarabhūṣitām |
S08n656:550: vṛṣaṃ gajaṃ tathā jñeyaṃ aśvaṃ cāmarabhūṣitam |
S08n656:557: etā nimittā māvedya iṣṭāṃ caiva niveditām ||
S08n656:563: ādhyeṣṭyo bhavennityaṃ taṃ liṅgī paśyato phalam ||
S08n656:566: yo yamiṣṭataraṃ paśyet so tasyaiva phalodayam |
S08n656:567: vācāṃ bahuvidhāṃ vavre yadā te mānuṣā bhuvi ||
S08n656:569: pareṣāṃ ca yadā vavre viśvastāśca samantataḥ ||
S08n656:570: evaṃ ca vācire mūcuḥ śubhaṃ śreyaṃ japaṃ sadā |
S08n656:576: jinaṃ padma tathā vajraṃ lokeśaṃ bodhimuttamam |
S08n656:579: śuśrāva śabdāṃ yathā gantā sarvāsāṃ prāpnuyā hi sau ||
S08n656:580: tato'nye lokavidviṣṭaṃ sa śabdaṃ cāpi ninditam |
S08n656:581: praśastā śakunayo hyetā prasthitānāṃ jape ratām ||
S08n656:583: tato'nya ninditaṃ sarva na lebhe kāyitaṃ phalam ||
S08n656:584: praśastaiva sarvato gacche apraśastaiśca na vrajet |
S08n656:586: svamantraṃ mantranāthaṃ ca mātāpitrau tha duḥkarām |
S08n656:587: praṇamya sarvato gacche śivaṃ tatra vinirdiśet ||
